 My site is gone! - Hey Frank



  Yep thats what I think too. So tripod ca=
nt handle the pressure, you just move to a place that can. 

  <<<Gets out =
the "donation" hat>>> So who can do what (website contruction wise) and how=
 quickly? Im off for a while...on vacation wooohooo... so I will do what I =
can to pitch in Frank. If you have your old website pages/files then we can=
 get that sucker up and running today in a few minutes just let me know. Ot=
herwise we need to build a new one.

  Misty

gfool@...> wrote:

lp with anything, let me know.  There are many people here who support you =
and your work and would be more than willing to jump right in to get it up =
and running!

    Hugs!
    Juli Velazquez

iety@...> wrote:

elp put something back online for you, so you can work on your boxes!

      Amy=

      Staten Island Paranormal Society
